text: addēhaṁ paṟaññu: enṟe janaṅṅaḷē, niṅṅaḷ cinticc nēākkiyiṭṭuṇṭēā? ñān enṟe rakṣitāviṅkal ninnuḷḷa vyaktamāya teḷivine avalambikkunnavanāyirikkukayuṁ avanṟe aṭukkal ninnuḷḷa kāruṇyaṁ avan enikk tannirikkukayuṁ, enniṭṭ niṅṅaḷkk (at kaṇṭaṟiyānāvātta vidhaṁ) andhata varuttappeṭukayumāṇ uṇṭāyiṭṭuḷḷateṅkil (ñān ent ceyyuṁ?) niṅṅaḷ at iṣṭappeṭāttavarāyirikke niṅṅaḷuṭe mēl nāṁ atin nirbandhaṁ celuttukayēā
